name: Waterfalls of Nova Scotia
description: Nova Scotia is blessed with numerous must-see waterfalls, and this volume from waterfall connoisseur Benoit Lalonde brings together 100 of the province’s best. Conveniently categorized by the Government of Nova Scotia's scenic route system, this rich compendium includes famous waterfalls such as Garden of Eden Fall, Wentworth Falls, Cuties Hollow, Annandale Falls and Butcher Hill Falls, as well as lesser-known but easy to locate gems. In addition to providing useful information on the height, type and hiking distance of each waterfall, the guide also assesses their degree of difficulty to reach for the convenience of both novice and advanced hikers. Featuring gorgeous colour photographs and individual maps of each location, Waterfalls of Nova Scotia offers an invaluable reference as well as a tribute to the beauty of the falls and the natural splendour waiting to be discovered.
